name: Space Trucker (itch) (DomDev)
description:
You are a Space Trucker, that is transporting goods. Your objective is to fix the ship, while it is bombed by Space Pirates.

How to play:
Movement - Press the arrow keys or W, A, S, D.
Use hammer - Press key 1
Use atomic rod - Press key 2
Fix energy computer - Press key 3
To see the ship stats - Press Tab
